text:
RELIGION

Ramayanam: Navalpakkam Narasimhan, Visranthi Mudhiyor Illam, Palavakkam, 3.45 p.m.; Nagai Mukundan, Gangai Kanda Mandapam, Triplicane, 7 p.m.

Gita: Satyavratananda Saraswati, Mylapore Club, Luz Church Rd., Mylapore, 11 a.m.

Thirupugazh: Mathivannan, Asthika Samajam, Venus Colony, Alwarpet, 6.30 p.m.

Jeevanmukti Vivekam: K.S. Maheswaran, Sri Sankara Gurukulam, 8/20, C.P. Ramaswamy Rd., Abhiramapuram, 5 p.m.

Guru Mahimai: P. Swaminathan, D.K. Subamangala Maaligai, Baba Nagar, Villivakkam, 6.30 p.m.

Devi Mahatmyam: Suprajananda, Ramakrishna Math, Mylapore, 8 a.m.

Vedanta Treatise: R. Aravindan, C Flat, Harmony, 20/39, Venkatarathinam Nagar, Adyar, 6.45 p.m.

GENERAL

Indo-Australian Chamber of Commerce: Interactive meeting on ‘University Partnerships in the IT Industry – an Indo-Australian Perspective’, Hotel Accord Metropolitan, 4.30 p.m.

Dr. Mohan’s Diabetes Specialities Centre: Presentation of the 25{+t}{+h}DMDSC Gold Metal Oration Award, Savera Hotel, 7.15 p.m.

Department of Journalism and Communication – University of Madras and Madras Union of Journalists: Seminar on ‘Contemporary Tamil Journalism … Issues and Challenges’, Tower Clock Building, Chepauk, 10.30 a.m.

Sri Vishnu Mohan Foundation: Inauguration of seminar on ‘Peace and Reconciliation: Perspectives from Religion and Philosophy’, 7/15, New Giri Rd., T. Nagar, 10 a.m.

The Tamil Chamber of Commerce: Budget analysis meeting, Hotel Ambassador Pallava, 6.30 p.m.

Valliammai Engineering College: Math Fest 2k16 programme, Kattankulathur, 10.30 a.m.

DMI Engineering College: Campus recruitment drive, Palanchur, 10 a.m.

J.N.N. Institute of Engineering: Annual day and Sports day, Kannigaipair, 10 a.m.

Dr. Ambedkar Academy The People’s Educational Trust: Discussion on ‘Economic development of Dalits’, L-73, Kavery Colony, 24{+t}{+h}St., Anna Nagar East, 6.30 p.m.

Krishna Sweets: Programme on Deiveega Kaveearangam, Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan, Mylapore, 6 p.m.

Narcotics Anonymous: Meeting, Staying Clean Group, St. Lourdes Church, Don Bosco School, Perambur, 7 p.m.

Al-Anon: Meetings, Police Community Hall, Kondithope, Walltax Rd.; Shrine of Divine Mercy Church, Anna Nagar East, Near Chinthamani; St. Andrews Church, Gandhi Rd., Guduvancherry; Ambedkar Mandram, Ashok Nagar; The Lady of the Light Church, Luz, Mylapore; Jacob MHSS., Judges Colony, Periakuppam, Thiruvallur, 7 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meetings, Loyola MHSS., United India Colony, Kodambakkam; St. Lukes Church, Anna Nagar; Anglo Indian Association, Ponniyamman Koil St., Egmore; Annai Velankanni Church, Besant Nagar; C.S.I. Good Shepherd Church, Taramani Link Rd., Velachery; Kondithope Community Centre, Police Quarters, Waltax Rd.; St. Mathias Church, Kamarajar Salai, K.K. Nagar; C.S.I. Church, Moolakadai; and The Lady of the Light Church, Luz Church Rd., Mylapore, 7 p.m.
title: Chennai today
